remarks: The property of being a choice set of length ` A ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
statement:
acni3.1 $e |- ( y = ( g ` x ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
acni3 $p |- ( ( X e. AC_ A /\ A. x e. A E. y e. X ph ) -> E. g ( g : A --> X /\ A. x e. A ps ) ) $.
$d A g x y $.
$d X g x y $.
$d g ph $.
$d g x $.
$d g x y $.
$d g y $.
$d ps y $.
